input.sentences: a skeleton keeps watch from atop the window .
lovely large home decorated for halloween
tombstone mark the yard for some holiday fun .
the skeleton pops out to scare visitors .
the grim reaper pops out of the ground to frighten the unwary .
output.sentences: The Halloween Haunted Mansion has a window that a skeleton looks over to keep watch of the grounds.
The mansion by itself is a lovely home, but every Halloween the owners decorate it with all kinds of awesome decorations.
The yard has tombstones marked with the names of the family who live there.
The visitors always get a good scare  from all of the spooky skeletons.
My favorite prop is an unwary skeleton that pops out of the ground!
